pr_title: Hangar Tab Popup List: Bulk Selection and Rank Fixes

timeline.message: Cleaning up minor issues in the code
Switching to try() {} catch to ensure the streams are closed properly
Switching first command to a constant, and fixing id comparison
Switching to constant commands
Modifying GM Mode to improve UX
Switching to using a variable to permit mass order cancellation and mass GM mode arrivals
Switching to Bulk GM methods where possible
Switching more functionality to be bulk select enabled

Removing unused newly added static check

Enabling bulk assignment of units to a single tech in the Unit Table
Fixing issues relating to the the names for activation/mothballing and adding ranks to the personnel for standard mothballing/activation
Cleaning up the code for MassMothballDialog
Fixing single mothball/activate name order
Variable definition fixes
Fixing getTechs
Adding sorting to the repair tab
Adding time to mass mothball display
Adding ranks to warehouse and fixing tech sorting
Making the weights for gbc heavier on the names to help with longer names
